CustomField.description: If AML Severity =High Then Display Red Color, Else If AML Severity =Medium Then Display Orange Color, Else If AML Severity =Low Then Display Green Color,
CustomField.formula:
IF( TEXT(AML_Severity__c) = 'High Risk', IMAGE("https://htmlcolorcodes.com/assets/images/colors/red-color-solid-background-1920x1080.png", "Red" , 20,70 ), IF( TEXT(AML_Severity__c) ='Medium Risk', IMAGE("https://htmlcolorcodes.com/assets/images/colors/orange-color-solid-background-1920x1080.png", "Orange" , 20,70), IF( TEXT(AML_Severity__c) ='Low Risk' ,IMAGE("https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/84/Flag_of_Libya_%281977%E2%80%932011%2C_2-3%29.svg/1200px-Flag_of_Libya_%281977%E2%80%932011%2C_2-3%29.svg.png", "Green" , 20,70 ), '')
) )
CustomField.label: AML Severity Color
